main event: Two objects were seen in the sky that appeared to be connected, with a white letter or number on each object. The objects were about 5-6 feet apart and were brown in color. They disappeared when the observer called someone.
interesting points: The objects were seen for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
The observer initially thought the objects were a toy kite.
The objects were situated about 5-6 thousand feet above the ground.
The wind conditions were clear and windy at the time of the sighting.
The observer used binoculars to view the objects.
sighted object: two connected brown objects with white letters/numbers
